description: Expert-level integrated system design with advanced thermal, EMI, and multi-domain optimization

problems.prompt: Quantum Dot Display Driver with HDR Peak Luminance: 8K HDR quantum dot display backlight requiring 10000 nit peak luminance with microsecond local dimming zones
constraints: Local dimming response < 10μs for HDR contrast
EMI must not interfere with quantum dot emission spectra
Flicker-free operation at all luminance levels
problems.application: 8K HDR quantum dot display backlight requiring 10000 nit peak luminance with microsecond local dimming zones

problems.prompt: Superconducting MRI Gradient Amplifier: High-performance MRI gradient coil driver for 7T research scanner requiring ultra-fast slew rates
constraints: Gradient slew rate > 200 T/m/s for advanced imaging sequences
No acoustic noise coupling to scanner bore
EMI shielding for RF coil compatibility
problems.application: High-performance MRI gradient coil driver for 7T research scanner requiring ultra-fast slew rates

problems.prompt: Neuromorphic Computing Power Architecture: Brain-inspired computing chip requiring adaptive power delivery matching neural activity patterns
constraints: Track neural firing pattern power variations in nanoseconds
1000:1 dynamic load range for sparse neural activity
Noise floor < 1mV for analog synapse accuracy
problems.application: Brain-inspired computing chip requiring adaptive power delivery matching neural activity patterns

problems.prompt: Tokamak Plasma Position Control Supply: ITER-class fusion reactor vertical stability system requiring megawatt-scale response in milliseconds
constraints: Millisecond response to prevent plasma disruption
Bidirectional power flow for position correction
Fault current limiting for coil protection
problems.application: ITER-class fusion reactor vertical stability system requiring megawatt-scale response in milliseconds

problems.prompt: Photonic Quantum Computer Laser Driver: Precision laser current source for photonic qubits requiring sub-ppm stability
constraints: Current stability < 1 ppm for quantum coherence
No switching transients during qubit operations
problems.application: Precision laser current source for photonic qubits requiring sub-ppm stability

problems.prompt: Deep Space Ion Thruster PPU: Power processing unit for interstellar probe ion engine operating decades without maintenance
problems.application: Power processing unit for interstellar probe ion engine operating decades without maintenance

problems.prompt: Terahertz Imaging Scanner Power Supply: Security scanner terahertz source requiring ultra-stable bias for coherent imaging
constraints: Bias stability for THz source coherence
problems.application: Security scanner terahertz source requiring ultra-stable bias for coherent imaging

problems.prompt: Gravitational Wave Detector Seismic Isolator: LIGO active seismic isolation actuator requiring atto-meter positioning precision
constraints: No mechanical vibration from power supply
Phase margin > 60° at all frequencies to 100kHz
problems.application: LIGO active seismic isolation actuator requiring atto-meter positioning precision

problems.prompt: Hypersonic Vehicle Thermal Management: Power supply for actively cooled leading edge of Mach 10+ vehicle during atmospheric reentry
constraints: All ceramic/SiC components for high temperature
problems.application: Power supply for actively cooled leading edge of Mach 10+ vehicle during atmospheric reentry

problems.prompt: Antimatter Production Facility Power: Antiproton accumulator ring magnet power supply at CERN-class facility
problems.application: Antiproton accumulator ring magnet power supply at CERN-class facility
